ABOUT US

Experience

At Paul Willis Electrical Ltd, we pride ourselves on providing an electrical service that has served Colne, Burnley, and Barnoldswick for over 20 years.

We have covered the same area for over 20 years and throughout that time, our professional service has been recommended by many. We have the experience of working in an industry that has evolved and changed but we always ensure that we adhere to all laws and regulations.

Our experience guarantees the highest level of workmanship and we always strive to provide our customers with a service they expect. We pay attention to the smallest of details while taking care of the job in hand.

Our Services

We cover both the domestic and Industrial & Commercial Sectors.

Our experienced, highly skilled and technical team of experts have the ability to work on a wide range of jobs, regardless of the sector. You might be a homeowner who needs additional sockets fitting or a business owner who requires the installation of emergency lighting, therefore, we cover the following:

Domestic Service:

  • Sockets & Light Fitting installations
  • Fuse board upgrades
  • LED spotlights
  • Fault Finding
  • Shower Installations
  • Cooker InstallationsSmoke & CO2 Alarm Installations
  • Security Alarm & Lighting systems
  • Heating Controls including Smart systems eg: Nest & Hive
  • Electrical Testing & Inspection (EICR)

Industrial and Commercial Service:

  • All Single or 3 Phase installations
  • Shop renovations
  • LED lighting upgrades
  • Emergency Lighting
  • Maintenance contracts

Our work is Guaranteed

All of our work comes fully insured, providing you with complete peace of mind. We also guarantee that our workmanship will fulfil your every need. We complete every job to the highest of standards and so, we are here for you until we achieve complete satisfaction.

We are here for you

We are your friendly and professional local electrician and so, when you need us, just give us a call. We cover all aspects of electrical work ranging from emergency call outs to project work. Whatever your requirements, give us a call today – we can provide a no-obligation quote that will not be beaten!

A service you can trust

There are many Electrical services out there that promise so much but fail to deliver. At Paul Willis Electrical Ltd, we can guarantee that we will go above and beyond to meet your needs. Regardless of the size of the job, we have a team of highly skilled electrical specialists on hand to complete the job in hand. We work with complete professionalism and believe that our service should be honest and transparent. Therefore, we work closely with you to provide you with feedback and progress of all jobs. This keeps you informed and helps you to make the right decisions at every stage.

We are proud to be a member of NAPIT and all work we undertake is inspected annually to ensure complete compliance and quality. This provides you with a service that consists of the highest standards and ensures that our workmanship continues to improve. We are constantly improving our working methods and always ensure that our understanding of regulations remains up to date.
